sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>If CVSS score for any existing hardening settings have been changed as part of new baseline changes, those settings needs to be captured as changed settings for hardening comparison.</description> <name>SC V1.3.2- Capture changes to CVSS score</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var scComplianceUtil = new sn_vsc.VSCComplianceUtil(); var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_vsc_instance_hardening_settings'); gr.addEncodedQuery("harc_name=Enable Account Recovery^ORharc_name=Enable Updated Version of Multi SSO Plugin"); gr.query(); while(gr.next()) { scComplianceUtil.updateSettingsInsert(gr.sys_id, gr.compliance_status); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-09-14 21:00:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a0656e15a0513110f877a1d68480d508</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>SC V1.3.2- Capture changes to CVSS score</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Security Center" source="sn_vsc">a51d46e3f2014110366b10017c5ba675</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Security Center">a51d46e3f2014110366b10017c5ba675</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a0656e15a0513110f877a1d68480d508</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-09-14 21:00:13</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
